Name: Rumpletini No. 2
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Swedish Bacardí Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Mattias Skoog at Linie Tio / Tjoget in Stockholm, Sweden. Mattias says, " Rumpletini No. 2 is a Legacy cocktail because it is accessible, available, and it attracts both cocktail enthusiasts and those who are new to cocktails. "
Nutrition: One serving of Rumpletini No. 2 contains 212 calories
